name: Moveless Chess (itch)
description:
Moveless Chess - Play chess without moving your pieces!

"A+ for chess nerd cleverness." ~ (Rock Paper Shotgun)

#MovelessChess is a game currently in development by Nico Saraintaris and Aikalen. It will be released for Android and iOS in the following weeks.

Follow Moveless Chess development here: http://movelesschess.com

CREDITS:

Art Design: @aikalen

Game Design & Game Dev: @NicoSaraintaris

* Special thanks to Michael from http://alekhinegames.com/ Amazing chess project in the Unity Asset Store :)
